ygData.subject: Re: Finding spells And learning languages
ygData.msgSnippet: The first one you will need to go somewhere for is  lvl 12 s Shock of Lightning.  It is in Ak Kon (spelling) I believe. Turqin of Mith Marr. LvL 13 ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
The first one you will need to go somewhere for is lvl 12's Shock of
Lightning. It is in Ak'Kon (spelling) I believe.

Turqin of Mith Marr.
LvL 13

-----Original Message-----
From: Sergey Bukhman [mailto:sergeyb@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 1:27 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Finding spells And learning languages


From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>



Vince Seese wrote:
>
> When I wanted Gate, I ended up hitting the Clerics in Felwithe.
>
> Micon

That's weird, because up to now level 12 spells, I have found all I ever
wanted and more either in the Felwithe Wizard guild or in the nearby
magic shop. I have never had to go to other guilds or to other cities.
And I'm pretty sure that you can find Gate in the Felwithe guild or in
the shop near it.

--
Qenelin, Level 10 wizard
Soulsek Ro
--

Nemo me impune lacessit!
